button.label: Show Editor
button.supertip: Displays a python code editor. Any data stored in the variable 'result' will be displayed as a table within the active worksheet.

button.label: Refresh
button.supertip: Executes any python code embedded in this worksheet. Press the escape key while editing for a quick refresh.

button.label: Refresh Before
button.supertip: Refresh all worksheets that this sheet is dependent upon, then refresh this sheet.

button.label: Refresh After
button.supertip: Refresh this worksheet, then refresh all worksheets that depend up it.
